name: bstrap4
description: ozmoroz.com Hugo theme. Based on Bootstrap v4 theme by Alan Orth.

scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style expanded --precision 6 --importer node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js source/scss/style.scss static/css/style.css.tmp && cleancss --level 1 static/css/style.css.tmp -o static/css/style.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:cookieconsent && npm run build:generatesri && npm run clean

author: Alan Orth (https://github.com/alanorth)
